mapper.select: select r.id, r.`name`,r.address,r.capacity,r.sqm,r.cellphone ,r.struct,r.coldtype,mt.type managetype,dt.type storagetype,te.type storagetempertype ,t.storagetruck,t.rdcscore,date_format(r.addtime, '%Y-%m-%d') addtime from rdc r LEFT JOIN rdcext t ON t.RDCID=r.id LEFT JOIN storagemanagetype mt on mt.id=t.managetype LEFT JOIN storagetype dt on dt.id=t.storagetype LEFT JOIN storagetempertype te on te.id=t.storagetempertype where r.id=#{rdcID} ORDER BY r.addtime desc ;
